lyrics.text:
If God be ours, we fear no powers, not of earth or sin or death. God sees and blesses in worst distresses, and can change them in a breath.
Wherefore the story tell of God's glory with heart and voices; all heaven rejoices, singing forever: Alleluia!
We shout for gladness, triumph o'er sadness, loving and praising, voices still raising glad hymns forever: Alleluia!
